common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Get the punishment records generated in the current quarter.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. 


Default is 1.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"bdMKnpR"},{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the \"page_no\" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. 


The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

","name":"page_size","sample":"10","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"mJQGMjj"},{"description":"

The status of punishment. Applicable values: 

1: Ongoing

2: Ended

","name":"punishment_status","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"QZYjaeQ"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DkKsEQx"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FrMzHRp"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FwTPmmS"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"pwkSdae","children":[{"description":"

The punishment records generated in the current quarter.

","name":"punishment_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"PnwMFRD","children":[{"description":"

The time when punishment are issued.

","name":"issue_time","sample":"","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"diKeYjs"},{"description":"

Start time in the duration of this punishment record.

","name":"start_time","sample":"","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"HeFTbiJ"},{"description":"

End time in the duration of this punishment record.

","name":"end_time","sample":"","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"dRGiWRh"},{"description":"

Punishment Type of this punishment record. Applicable values: 

103: Listings not displayed in category browsing
104: Listings not displayed in search
105: Unable to create new listings
106: Unable to edit listings
107: Unable to join marketing campaigns
108: No shipping subsidies
109: Account is suspended
600: Listings not displayed in search
601: Shop listings hide from recommendation
602: Listings not displayed in category browsing
1109: Listing Limit is reduced
1110: Listing Limit is reduced
1111: Listing Limit is reduced
1112: Listing Limit is reduced

2008: Order Limit

","name":"punishment_type","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"MQEcXWs"},{"description":"

Reason of this punishment record. Applicable values: 

1: Tier 1

2: Tier 2

3: Tier 3

4: Tier 4

5: Tier 5

1109: Listing Limit Tier 1

1110: Listing Limit Tier 2

1111: Listing Limit POL

","name":"reason","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"FtdRmJQ"},{"description":"

Reference ID for this punishment record.

","name":"reference_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ZdzBpwT"},{"description":"

Return the specific value of listing limit when punishment_type is: 

1109: Listing Limit is reduced
1110: Listing Limit is reduced
1111: Listing Limit is reduced
1112: Listing Limit is reduced

","name":"listing_limit","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"JtyJNnP"},{"description":"

Return the specific percentage of order limit when punishment_type is: 

2008: Order Limit


Daily Order Limit = X % * L28D ADO (Average Daily Order of this Shop in Past 28 Days)

","name":"order_limit","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JGyNzPk"}]},{"description":"

Total number of punishment records.

","name":"total_count","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"cYhDWMS"}]}]}
